Dima Yagnyuk
visual & interactive designer

About

About

An independent designer and illustrator in Vancouver, BC.

Besides design I have an academic background in psychology and have previously worked in advertising. Today I work with print and digital projects, doing illustration, identity and interface design. Currently I am working on a BC Wineries project, and am available for additional work and/or collaborations.

Email me to get in touch.
